Question: After Independence, this person returned to Virginia and was elected to the Virginia House of Delegates for Albemarle County.
Hints: This person also ordered five separate naval bombardments of Tripoli, which restored peace in the Mediterranean for a while.
Instead of retreating, this person sent federal agents to secretly track down smugglers and violators.
Though born into a wealthy slave-owning family, this person had many financial problems, and died deeply in debt.
